Description:
Minimum Qualifications:A Technical Diploma holder in Engineering.Minimum Experience:4 years' experience in control room operations in the Power / Water desalination unitsSkills:Knowledge of relevant plant equipment and control room operations
Awareness of HSE & quality standards
Knowledge of all relevant plant processes and equipment
Attention to detail
Extensive knowledge of operating systems like DCS, SCADA, PLC etc.
Knowledge of downtime analysis and good knowledge of problem solving tools
Knowledge of power and water desalination operational activities
Mentoring, coaching and people management skills
Planning, organizing, and integration skillsTeam work and effective collaboration skillsJob Details
